text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea palosapis (called, along with some other species in the genus Shorea, Philippine Mahogany or White Lauan) is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is endemic to the Philippines.  It is threatened by habitat loss which stems from recent human involvement in its natural habitat.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea palosapis". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33143A9762340. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33143A9762340.en.
